title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Combine all ingredients with pasta and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken in a buttery, creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Combine chicken with sauce and simmer.
